DataElement.preferredName: Anti-diarrheal Agent Current Cycle First Dose Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of the first dose of anti-diarrheal medication in the current treatment cycle.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Antidiarrheal Agent Current Therapy Cycle First Dose
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pharmacological agent that may ameliorate the symptoms of diarrhetic illnesses._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Miscellaneous agents found useful in the symptomatic treatment of diarrhea. They have no effect on the agent(s) that cause diarrhea, but merely alleviate the condition. (MeSH)

Concepts.definition: A pharmacological agent that may ameliorate the symptoms of diarrhetic illnesses.

Property.preferredDefinition: The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
